title: Annual Drama Festival
description: The Annual Drama Night is one of the most anticipated cultural events on campus
desc: The Annual Drama Night is one of the most anticipated cultural events on campus, celebrating the vibrant talent of our university's Drama Club. This year's edition features a mix of original student-written scripts, classic theatrical adaptations, and experimental stage performances. The event promises to transport the audience through a rollercoaster of emotions with compelling storytelling, powerful dialogues, and captivating stage design. From spine-chilling suspense to heartwarming narratives, each act is carefully crafted and directed by students. Come and witness a magical evening where creativity meets performance, and the stage comes alive with passion, energy, and artistic excellence.

title: Basketball Championship
description: Cheer for our team in the inter-university basketball championship finals.

title: Tech Career Fair
description: Meet top tech companies and explore internship and job opportunities.

title: Hackathon 48Hrs
description: Code for 48 hours and win prizes.
